labInfo.title: Create Your Own Unique Bubble Tea!
labInfo.content: In Unicup bubble teashop, you are the professionalist of making tea drinks. You could create your special tea drinks with the best materails we provided.

labInfo.title: Crafted with Premium Tea Leaves from Taiwan
labInfo.content: Take a sip of our tea drink and you will experience each tea has its own determined aroma and taste.

labInfo.title: Healthy & Delicious Options Just for You
labInfo.content: We are providing healthy tapioca which is made of various healthy nuts cereal powder. The tapioca is more healthy , tasty, and chewy!
